amendment.description: Amendment provides $300,000 to reimburse Monroe County, Michigan, for costs associated with the crash of Comair Flight 3272.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in House Rpt. 105-97, to provide $300,000 of the unobligated funds for salaries and expense for the National Transportation Safety Board to be made available to Monroe County Michigan for reimbursement costs in connection witht the crash of Connair Flight 3272.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
